summary:
**Monthly Investment Update & NTA Report (31 July 2025) - Key Points:**  

- **Performance:** Portfolio returned **+3.9%** (vs. MSCI AC World Index +3.2%), driven by tech, communications, and healthcare holdings.  
- **NTA:** Pre-tax NTA **$1.5735**; Post-tax NTA **$1.5226**.  
- **Dividend Yield:** Current yield **4.23%**; maximum franked dividend **1.75cps**.  
- **Key Contributors:** Taiwan Semiconductor, Alphabet, Novartis, UBS Group, Shinhan Financial, and new positions (e.g., Rogers Communications).  
- **Valuation Metrics:** Portfolio trades at a **53% higher earnings yield** (8.1% vs. index 5.3%) and **48% discount on P/B** (1.7x vs. index 3.3x).  
- **Exposure:** **80.1% net long** (Asia-Pacific 28.5%, Europe 27.6%, North America 21.9%); **19.9% cash**.  
- **Market Outlook:** Caution on US tariff/employment risks; portfolio diversified across Europe, Asia, and value sectors.  

*(Note: Excluded operational/boilerplate details.)*
